name: VIDEO_SOURCE_VIDEO_SIZE_CHANGED
description: Occurs when the video size or rotation of a specified user changes.The callback for the second instance.

parameters.uid: The ID of the user whose video size or rotation changes. uid is 0 for the local user.

parameters.width: The width (pixels) of the video stream.

parameters.height: The height (pixels) of the video stream.

parameters.rotation: The rotation information. The value range is [0,360).
